fno: In the cash market, the Nifty 50 declined 144.90 points or 0.74% to settle at 19,381.65. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, fell 0.82% to 11.19. Vedanta, ICICI Bank and HDFC Bank were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The August 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 31 August 2023.
